resources.string: Not much to do in a gallery without accessing your storage
Folder name must not be empty
Please choose the root folder of the SD card to grant write access on the next screen
Could not write to the selected destination
Source and destination cannot be the same
An error occurred during the copy
A file with that name already exists
Could not overwrite the source file
No app capable of it has been found
More simple apps and source code at:\nhttp://simplemobiletools.com
Send your feedback or suggestions to:

string.name: rate_us_underlined
string.u: Rate us in the Play Store

resources.string: Same sorting for files and folders
